rows.label: tlk42100152_03_msg0001
rows.name:
Ugh, how awful!
This country is too hot.

rows.label: tlk42100152_03_msg0002
rows.name:
In this heat, won't the Divine Beast
get exhausted and fall into the
Cloud Sea?

rows.label: tlk42100152_03_msg0003
rows.name:
Since humans did this to the Divine Beast,
I wish humans would do something about it.

rows.label: tlk42100152_03_msg0004
rows.name:
If it does fall, I'll sneak onto a ship
and go to Liberalitas.

rows.label: tlk42100152_03_msg0005
rows.name:
I heard the Demon King is gone,
so I want to try visiting the Phonex colony!
